mapper.select:
select m.*,n.imgurl as imgurl from jp_worship m,jp_worship_oblation n where m.oblationid = n.id and date_add(m.createtime, interval n.duration minute) > now() order by m.createtime desc
limit 0,#{count,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.*,n.imgurl as imgurl from jp_worship m,jp_worship_oblation n where m.oblationid = n.id and m.oblationtypeid=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and date_add(m.createtime, interval n.duration minute) > now() order by m.createtime desc limit 0,2
